title: Stock Market Falls Ahead of Tech Earnings - The Wall Street Journal
content:
1. Stock Market Falls Ahead of Tech Earnings  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Dow loses 500 points, Nasdaq falls 3% as April sell-off resumes led by tech stocks  CNBC
  3. US stocks fall as investors await Big Tech earnings  Al Jazeera English
  4. Stocks fall ahead of earnings from Big Tech companies  OCRegister
  5. Stock Market Today - 4/26: Stocks Edge Lower On Fed, China Risk With Big Tech Earnings In Focus  TheStreet
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: U.S. stock indexes were down ahead of a wave of earnings reports from major technology and blue-chip firms.
